channel.title: Arduino on Alexander Else

item.title: Cloud Toy
item.author: aelse@else.id.au (Alexander Else)
item.description: I was in a shop recently and came across a child’s nightlight I liked the look of. I thought it’d make the start of a good IoT project (because cloud). My plan is to turn this into an indicator of when things are broken. The theme will be along the lines of: How Using a Wemos D1 mini I can have “the cloud” connect over wifi to a message queue to receive control messages instructing it on how to configure its lights.
